Structs/Question.html#/s:9quizmaker8Ques.name: D

Structs/EditProfile.html.name: EditProfile

Structs/Participant.html.name: Participant

Structs/SignUp.html.name: SignUp

Protocols/Router.html#/s:9quizmaker6Rout.name: request(_:completion:)
Protocols/Router.html#/s:9quizmaker6Rout.abstract: URLRequest was set according to endpoint and request will send through URLSession to API. After that completion block will be called to specify that response was received.

Protocols/Router.html#/s:9quizmaker6Rout.name: invalidateSession()
Protocols/Router.html#/s:9quizmaker6Rout.abstract: Invalidates and cancels the current URLSession and remove from memory.

Protocols/EndpointType.html#/s:9quizmake.name: baseURL
Protocols/EndpointType.html#/s:9quizmake.abstract: Returns a base URL to identify where will be the destination of the request.

Protocols/EndpointType.html#/s:9quizmake.name: path
Protocols/EndpointType.html#/s:9quizmake.abstract: Returns a path to identify what comes after base URL.

Protocols/EndpointType.html#/s:9quizmake.name: httpMethod
Protocols/EndpointType.html#/s:9quizmake.abstract: Returns an HTTP Method that will be used from urlRequest.

Protocols/EndpointType.html#/s:9quizmake.name: task
Protocols/EndpointType.html#/s:9quizmake.abstract: A helper that returns which encoding style will be used.

Protocols/EndpointType.html#/s:9quizmake.name: headers
Protocols/EndpointType.html#/s:9quizmake.abstract: A helper that returns the header informations if any, if not returns nil.

Protocols/ParameterEncoder.html#/s:9quiz.name: encode(urlRequest:with:)
Protocols/ParameterEncoder.html#/s:9quiz.abstract: Encodes the given parameters dictionary to corresponding urlRequest. It does not returns the urlRequest back because it is given as inout parameter which means that modifying the local variable will also modify the passed-in parameters.

Protocols/ParameterEncoder.html.name: ParameterEncoder
Protocols/ParameterEncoder.html.abstract: An interface helps the communication between API and the client.

Protocols/EndpointType.html.name: EndpointType
Protocols/EndpointType.html.abstract: An interface to helps endpoints to define BaseURL, path of the url, HTTPMethod, HTTPTask and Header Information of the request.

Protocols/Router.html.name: Router
Protocols/Router.html.abstract: An interface that helps to create network layer between API and client.

Extensions/UserDefaults.html#/s:So14NSUs.name: isLogged()
Extensions/UserDefaults.html#/s:So14NSUs.abstract: Controls if the user is logged into the system by checking defaults.

Extensions/UserDefaults.html#/s:So14NSUs.name: logout()
Extensions/UserDefaults.html#/s:So14NSUs.abstract: When the user logs out, it finds all attributes that was saved to defaults and removes each of them. Also, sets isLogged boolean value to false.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: showErrorAlert(message:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Opens a popup dialog and if the given message is not empty shows the message, otherwise it opens the popup dialog with dynamic message for example an error occupied.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: showDismissAlert(_:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Opens a popup dialog that will gives feedback to user after he calls a function that changes the content of the system. For example when the user updates his quiz it opens a pop up dialog saying quiz is updated successfully.

Enums/HTTPTask.html#/s:9quizmaker8HTTPTa.name: request
Enums/HTTPTask.html#/s:9quizmaker8HTTPTa.abstract: Default request contains no body parameter and no url parameter

Enums/HTTPTask.html#/s:9quizmaker8HTTPTa.name: requestParameters(encoding:bodyParameters:urlParameters:)
Enums/HTTPTask.html#/s:9quizmaker8HTTPTa.abstract: Requests with parameter could be both, url or body.

Enums/HTTPTask.html#/s:9quizmaker8HTTPTa.name: requestParametersAndHeaders(encoding:bodyParameters:urlParameters:additionalHeaders:)
Enums/HTTPTask.html#/s:9quizmaker8HTTPTa.abstract: Requests with parameter could be both, url or body and also one time additional headers.

Enums/NetworkError/ClientError.html#/s:9.name: jsonDecodingFailure
Enums/NetworkError/ClientError.html#/s:9.abstract: Data could not be decoded into the Codable object.

Enums/NetworkError/ClientError.html.name: ClientError
Enums/NetworkError/ClientError.html.abstract: Indicates an error occupied from the client side.

Enums/UserEndpoint.html#/s:9quizmaker12U.name: students
Enums/UserEndpoint.html#/s:9quizmaker12U.abstract: Request for retrieving students who registered into the system.

Enums/QuizEndpoint.html#/s:9quizmaker12Q.name: course(id:)
Enums/QuizEndpoint.html#/s:9quizmaker12Q.abstract: Requests for retrieving quizzes for specific course.

Enums/QuizEndpoint.html#/s:9quizmaker12Q.name: participants(quizID:)
Enums/QuizEndpoint.html#/s:9quizmaker12Q.abstract: Requests for retrieving participants of the specified quiz.

Enums/QuizEndpoint.html#/s:9quizmaker12Q.name: owner
Enums/QuizEndpoint.html#/s:9quizmaker12Q.abstract: Requests for retrieving quizzes that was created by logged user.

Enums/QuizEndpoint.html#/s:9quizmaker12Q.name: participantEnd
Enums/QuizEndpoint.html#/s:9quizmaker12Q.abstract: Requests for retrieving quizzes that was appended earlier and finished.

Enums/QuizEndpoint.html#/s:9quizmaker12Q.name: participantWaiting

Enums/QuizEndpoint.html#/s:9quizmaker12Q.name: participantAnswer(quizID:)
Enums/QuizEndpoint.html#/s:9quizmaker12Q.abstract: Requests for retrieving answers of logged user for specified quiz.

Enums/QuizEndpoint.html#/s:9quizmaker12Q.name: ownerParticipantAnswer(quizID:userID:)
Enums/QuizEndpoint.html#/s:9quizmaker12Q.abstract: Requests for retrieving answers of the specified user for specified quiz.

Enums/QuizEndpoint.html#/s:9quizmaker12Q.name: append(quizID:)
Enums/QuizEndpoint.html#/s:9quizmaker12Q.abstract: Requests for appending a quiz if it is not private and not finished yet.

Enums/QuestionEndpoint.html#/s:9quizmake.name: answer(id:finishedIn:completion:answers:)
Enums/QuestionEndpoint.html#/s:9quizmake.abstract: Performs creation of answers for corresponding questions after appending a quiz.

Enums/QuestionEndpoint.html#/s:9quizmake.name: validate(quizID:userID:answers:)
Enums/QuestionEndpoint.html#/s:9quizmake.abstract: Performs validation of quiz questions for participant. It can be only done by instructor who owns the quiz instance.

Enums/CourseEndpoint.html#/s:9quizmaker1.name: owner
Enums/CourseEndpoint.html#/s:9quizmaker1.abstract: Requests for retrieving courses which is owned by logged instructor.

Enums/CourseEndpoint.html#/s:9quizmaker1.name: appendStudent(courseID:students:)
Enums/CourseEndpoint.html#/s:9quizmaker1.abstract: Requests for retrieving courses which is owned by logged instructor.

Enums/CourseEndpoint.html#/s:9quizmaker1.name: myLectures
Enums/CourseEndpoint.html#/s:9quizmaker1.abstract: Requests for retrieving all courses which contains logged student.

Enums/AuthenticationEndpoint.html#/s:9qu.name: forgotPassword(email:)
Enums/AuthenticationEndpoint.html#/s:9qu.abstract: Calling this method will request for an email to reset the password.

Enums/ParameterEncoding.html#/s:9quizmak.name: bodyEncoding
Enums/ParameterEncoding.html#/s:9quizmak.abstract: For Body JSON Encoding for HTTPMethods post, put, patch etc.

Enums/ParameterEncoding.html#/s:9quizmak.name: encode(urlRequest:bodyParameters:urlParameters:)
Enums/ParameterEncoding.html#/s:9quizmak.abstract: Encodes the given parameters dictionary to corresponding urlRequest. It does not returns the urlRequest back because it is given as inout parameter which means that modifying the local variable will also modify the passed-in parameters.

Enums/EncoderError.html#/s:9quizmaker12E.name: encodingFailed
Enums/EncoderError.html#/s:9quizmaker12E.abstract: A case that something went wrong while trying to encode.

Enums/Gender.html#/s:9quizmaker6GenderO1.name: unspecified
Enums/Gender.html#/s:9quizmaker6GenderO1.abstract: user has not set gender yet or does not want to specify.

Enums/QuestionType.html.name: QuestionType
Enums/QuestionType.html.abstract: An enumeration designated to specify question type.

Enums/UserType.html.name: UserType
Enums/UserType.html.abstract: An enumeration designated to specify user type.

Enums/EncoderError.html.name: EncoderError
Enums/EncoderError.html.abstract: A custom error enumeration helps to identify which error was occuring while encoding function is running.

Enums/ParameterEncoding.html.name: ParameterEncoding
Enums/ParameterEncoding.html.abstract: An enumeration for encoding and for preparing urlRequest to be ready to communicate.

Enums/AuthenticationEndpoint.html.name: AuthenticationEndpoint
Enums/AuthenticationEndpoint.html.abstract: An endpoint provider to communicate with the API to perform authentication such as login, register or forgot password.

Enums/CourseEndpoint.html.name: CourseEndpoint
Enums/CourseEndpoint.html.abstract: An endpoint provider to communicate with the API for performing course tasks such as retrieve, create, update or delete.

Enums/QuestionEndpoint.html.name: QuestionEndpoint
Enums/QuestionEndpoint.html.abstract: An endpoint provider to communicate with the API for performing question tasks such as create, update or delete.

Enums/QuizEndpoint.html.name: QuizEndpoint
Enums/QuizEndpoint.html.abstract: An endpoint provider to communicate with the API for performing quiz tasks such as retrieve, create, update or delete.

Enums/UserEndpoint.html.name: UserEndpoint
Enums/UserEndpoint.html.abstract: An endpoint provider to communicate with the API for performing user tasks such as retrieve, create, update or delete.

Enums/Result.html.name: Result
Enums/Result.html.abstract: Result of the API Request. If response status code is in between 199 and 300 success case will be used otherwise failure case will be used.

Enums/NetworkError.html.name: NetworkError
Enums/NetworkError.html.abstract: Custom error enumeration used in API calls inherits from Swift.Error class.

Enums/HTTPMethod.html.name: HTTPMethod
Enums/HTTPMethod.html.abstract: An enumeration specifies which HTTP method will be used in request.

Enums/HTTPTask.html.name: HTTPTask
Enums/HTTPTask.html.abstract: A helper that returns which encoding style will be used.

Classes/PublicQuizListViewModel.html#/s:.name: items

Classes/PublicQuizListViewModel.html#/s:.name: init()

Classes/PublicQuizListViewModel.html#/s:.name: fetch(_:)
Classes/PublicQuizListViewModel.html#/s:.abstract: Fires an HTTP GET API request to the given endpoint. Response will be converted to observable of needed object.

Classes/PublicQuizListViewModel.html#/s:.name: append(_:)
Classes/PublicQuizListViewModel.html#/s:.abstract: Fires a API request. If the given quiz id will found in the system it will be validated. If validation is ok then logged user will append to the quiz.

Classes/AnswerQuestionsViewModel.html#/s.name: init(quiz:)

Classes/AnswerQuestionsViewModel.html#/s.name: setAnswer(_:)
Classes/AnswerQuestionsViewModel.html#/s.abstract: Append given answer to the participant answer array.

Classes/AnswerQuestionsViewModel.html#/s.name: sendAnswers(time:)
Classes/AnswerQuestionsViewModel.html#/s.abstract: Performs creation of answers for the participant. It sends the current answer to the server and save them to validate later.

Classes/AnswerQuestionsViewModel.html#/s.name: timeIsUp(time:)
Classes/AnswerQuestionsViewModel.html#/s.abstract: If and only if called when the quiz is finished while user trying to answer some questions. It takes the current answers of the participant, freeze the system for a while then performs creation of answers for the participant. It sends the current answer to the server and save them to validate later.
